                                         byte[] secret)

        Encrypts a message using the supplied secretKey and nonce Returns an encrypted message, using the secretKey and nonce. If the nonce was not supplied, a random value is generated. example 

        naclEncrypt([...], [...]); // => [...]

      • naclKeypairFromSeed

        public static Types.Keypair naclKeypairFromSeed(byte[] seed)

        Creates a new public/secret keypair from a seed. Returns a object containing a publicKey & secretKey generated from the supplied seed. example 

        naclKeypairFromSeed(...); // => { secretKey: [...], publicKey: [...] }

      • naclVerify

        public static boolean naclVerify(byte[] message,
                                 byte[] signature,
                                 byte[] publicKey)

        Verifies the signature on the supplied message. Verifies the signature on message with the supplied plublicKey. Returns true on sucess, false otherwise. example 

        naclVerify([...], [...], [...]); // => true/false
